SEARCH
Package managers

Class ContactManager

java.lang.Object
managers.ContactManager
public class ContactManager extends Object
ContactManager class handling all contact-related database operations. Provides methods for CRUD operations, searching, sorting, and statistics. Demonstrates abstraction, encapsulation, and data management best practices.
Version:
1.0
Author:
CMPE-343 Project Group

  • Method Details

    • getAllContacts

      public List<Contact> getAllContacts()
      Retrieves all contacts from the database.
      Returns:
      List of all contacts

    • getContactById

      public Contact getContactById(int contactId)
      Retrieves a contact by ID.
      Parameters:
      contactId - The contact ID
      Returns:
      Contact object if found, null otherwise

    • addContact

      public int addContact(Contact contact)
      Adds a new contact to the database.
      Parameters:
      contact - The Contact object to add
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly added contact, or -1 if failed

    • updateContact

      public boolean updateContact(Contact contact)
      Updates an existing contact in the database.
      Parameters:
      contact - The Contact object with updated information
      Returns:
      true if update successful, false otherwise

    • deleteContact

      public boolean deleteContact(int contactId)
      Deletes a contact from the database.
      Parameters:
      contactId - The ID of the contact to delete
      Returns:
      true if deletion successful, false otherwise

    • deleteContacts

      public int deleteContacts(List<Integer> contactIds)
      Deletes multiple contacts from the database.
      Parameters:
      contactIds - List of contact IDs to delete
      Returns:
      The number of contacts successfully deleted

    • searchByField

      public List<Contact> searchByField(String fieldName, String value, boolean exactMatch)
      Searches contacts by a single field with exact or partial match.
      Parameters:
      fieldName - The field name to search
      value - The value to search for
      exactMatch - true for exact match, false for partial match
      Returns:
      List of matching contacts

    • searchByCriteria

      public List<Contact> searchByCriteria(SearchCriteria criteria)
      Searches contacts using flexible search criteria with multiple fields.
      Parameters:
      criteria - The SearchCriteria object containing search parameters
      Returns:
      List of matching contacts

    • sortContacts

      public List<Contact> sortContacts(List<Contact> contacts, String fieldName, boolean ascending)
      Sorts a list of contacts by a specified field in ascending or descending order.
      Parameters:
      contacts - The list of contacts to sort
      fieldName - The field name to sort by
      ascending - true for ascending order, false for descending
      Returns:
      Sorted list of contacts

    • getContactStatistics

      public Map<String,Object> getContactStatistics()
      Gets statistical information about contacts.
      Returns:
      Map containing various statistics

    • getContactCount

      public int getContactCount()
      Gets the total count of contacts in the database.
      Returns:
      The total number of contacts

    • emailExists

      public boolean emailExists(String email)
      Checks if an email already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      email - The email to check
      Returns:
      true if email exists, false otherwise

    • emailExistsForOtherContact

      public boolean emailExistsForOtherContact(String email, int excludeContactId)
      Checks if an email exists for a different contact (used during updates).
      Parameters:
      email - The email to check
      excludeContactId - The contact ID to exclude from the check
      Returns:
      true if email exists for another contact, false otherwise

    • addContactWithId

      public boolean addContactWithId(Contact contact)
      This method adds a contact but FORCES it to keep its specific ID. We use this only for UNDO operations to restore a deleted contact exactly as it was.
      Parameters:
      contact - The contact to add with its existing ID
      Returns:
      true if contact was added successfully, false otherwise
